title: Low Carb Tandoori Chicken
directions: In a large bowl mix together all the spices. Add the Greek yogurt and red food dye, if using.
Add the chicken and spread the marinade all over. Cover and leave in the fridge overnight.
Preheat the oven to 400F. Place the chicken on a baking rack over a baking tray.
Roast for 40-45 minutes or until cooked through.
ingredients: 2 chicken breasts on the bone (skin removed)
